column1: Local Foods////Their crispy chicken sandwich is the best sandwich in town.  There.  I said it.  Pretzel bun
column3: some sort of heavenly dressing and I'm pretty sure crushed home-made potato chips.  Woweee.  The sides are a little too "natural" for me.  Like they're trying to hard to incorporate kale
column4: quinoa and all other things granola and the flavor combinations are a little bit bizarre.  But the crispy chicken is dream-worthy.  Parking around noon is a disaster so plan to go early or late.
